DOC.brief_summary: The purpose non-interventional , retrospective study exist data evaluate clinical outcome related Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus hospital base pneumonia treatment among subpopulation .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Outcomes Methicillin Resistant Staphylococcus Aureus ( MRSA ) Hospital-Based Pneumonia
DOC.detailed_description: All patient meet inclusion/exclusion criterion inpatient database 1/1/02-9/30/10 .
DOC.criteria: MRSA pneumonia case ICD9 code identification . Diagnosis include inpatient stay . Treatment initiation hospital . Death discharge within 3 day treatment initiation . Exposure treatment MRSA activity .
